titles.title: I Teach Act of 2015
Incentives to Educate American Children Act of 2015

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax incentive to individuals teaching in public elementary and secondary schools located in rural or high unemployment areas and to individuals who achieve certification from the National Board for Professional Teaching Standards, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
